channel.title: [PI] Ancient Curses
channel.description: Anyone know why when I click on my altar it switches to ancient curses, but when I switch tabs (Prayer tab - Inventory, ect), they revert back to normal prayers without curses staying on. Anyway to fix that?

item.title: [PI] Ancient Curses
item.dc:creator: @Chaotic-Scape Chaotic-Scape
item.description:
@Chaotic-Scape wrote:

Anyone know why when I click on my altar it switches to ancient curses, but when I switch tabs (Prayer tab - Inventory, ect), they revert back to normal prayers without curses staying on. Anyway to fix that?
